    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_106666</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Diagram for the changes in state of matter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramm für die Änderungen in der Tatsache</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme pour les changements de l'état de 
choses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama para as mudanças no estado da matéria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo schema per i cambiamenti dentro 
dichiara della materia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα για τις αλλαγές στην κατάσταση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama para los cambios en declaraciones</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the three states of matter and the processes involved as matter changes state from one to another.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">changes in state</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">condensation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">freezing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sublimation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">three states of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm stellt dar, daß die drei 
Zustände des Stoffes und der Prozesse, die als Stoff mit einbezogen 
werden, Zustand von einem zu anderen ändert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre que les trois états de 
matière et des processus impliqués comme matière change l'état 
d'un à l'autre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que os três estados da 
matéria e dos processos envolvidos como a matéria mudam o estado de 
um a outro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra che i tre dichiarano 
della materia ed i processi addetti come cambiamenti della materia 
dichiarano da uno ad un altro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τις τρεις καταστάσεις του 
θέματος και τις διαδικασίες που περιλαμβάνονται ως κράτος αλλαγών
θέματος από ένα σε άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que los tres estados de la 
materia y de los procesos implicados como materia cambian el estado a 
partir del uno a otro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Änderungen im Zustand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensation</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
